name: Performapal Odd-Eyes Light Phoenix
text: During either player's turn: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 "Performapal" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.
pendulum_text: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while you have a card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy the card in your other Pendulum Zone, and if you do, Special Summon this card.
